errors.error_description: In the layered requirements example, `dev-requirements.in` tries to use a non-existent file `base-requirements.txt` as a constraint instead of the generated `requirements.txt`.
The `.pre-commit-config.yaml` example is missing the mandatory `rev` key, which specifies the version of the `pip-tools` repository to use, making the configuration invalid.
correction_candidates: Add `rev: <latest-version-tag>` to the hook configuration, for example `rev: 7.4.1`.
errors.golden_answer: Add `rev: <latest-version-tag>` to the hook configuration, for example `rev: 7.4.1`.
